businesses.question: What's the best aquarium for kids in Sarasota?
businesses.name: Mote Marine Laboratory & Aquarium
businesses.description: Mote Marine offers interactive exhibits with manatees, sharks, and sea turtles, plus educational programs on conservation that engage kids through touch tanks and animal encounters. As a nonprofit research institution, it's transitioning to the new Mote SEA facility at Nathan Benderson Park in late 2025 for expanded family experiences. Locals recommend visiting during manatee rehabilitation seasons for unique sightings, and note free parking at the current City Island location‚Äîperfect for combining with nearby Bayfront Park playtime.
